channel.title: Air Force Warrant Officer Association – 1. WOTS
channel.description: Recent content in 1. WOTS on Air Force Warrant Officer Association

item.title: Fitness
item.description: WOTS can be very physically demanding, this section is intended to provide some recommendations on that front.

item.title: Packing
item.description:
This page will help you keep track of items that you still need to obtain. This should be a fairly comprehensive list, but if you find anything to be missing, please reach out. The official packing list can be found in the WOTS Reporting Guide.

Note that Amazon links are affiliate links to cover the costs of this website and other AFWOA services. Additionally, images used not necessarily the same as the linked products and are provided for easy reference.

Filters

Service Uniform

Dress Shoes

Black, dress, oxford, or plain toe – High heels/pumps are not authorized

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

♂

♀

Officer Service Coat

Ensure same fabric composition as Blues Pants. Must have dark braid and epaulets attached. Maxwell Alterations has 5 weeks turn around

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Blues Pants

Ensure same fabric composition as Service Coat. Wool or polyester w/ a minimum of 1 wool

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

♂

♀

Blues Shirt (Long Sleeve)

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

♂

♀

Blues Shirt (Short Sleeve)

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

♂

♀

Flight Cap

Silver & Blue Braid – NOT General Officer Silver Braid

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Neck Tie

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

♂

Neck Tab

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

♀

Belt

Blue w/ Chrome Buckle

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Undershirts

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 3

Black Dress Socks

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 4

Shirt Garters

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Lightweight Jacket

May be embroidered

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Blues Name Tag

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Service Dress Name Tag

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

US Officer Lapel Pins

Set of 2

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Metal Rank

2x for Service Coat, 1x for Hat – Available for purchase at Maxwell Clothing Sales

Minimum: 3

Recommended: 3

Full Ribbon Rack

Minimum: 3

Recommended: 3

Required Duty Badges

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

Utility Uniform

Boots

Coyote Brown

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

OCP Pants

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 4

OCP Blouse

Must have velcro

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 4

OCP Cap

Patrol Style

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

Belt

Rigger style, Tan 499 Color

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Blousing Straps

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 4

T-Shirt

Crew neck, Coyote Brown

Minimum: 5

Recommended: 7

OCP Fleece

Coyote Brown, Required October - March

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

ECWCS

Extended Cold Weather Clothing System (ECWCS), same as Gortex

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Watch Cap

Black or Coyote Brown, Required October - March

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

OCP Socks

Coyote Brown or DLA Green

Minimum: 5

Recommended: 7

Gloves

Black or Coyote Brown; 1 Warm Pair (Oct - Mar), 1 Work Pair

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

Name Tapes

Spice Brown print on OCP, Velcro

Minimum: 3

Recommended: 4

USAF Tapes

Spice Brown print on OCP, Velcro

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 3

US Flag Patch

Spice Brown embroidered, Velcro

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 3

Physical Training Gear

Athletic Shoes

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 3

USAF PTG Shorts

Minimum: 3

Recommended: 5

♂

♀

USAF PTG Shirt

Minimum: 3

Recommended: 5

♂

♀

USAF PTG Running Pants

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

♂

♀

USAF PTG Jacket

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

♂

♀

Running Socks

Minimum: 5

Recommended: 7

Hygiene

Standard Hygiene Items

60 Day Supply; AAFES has limited options; Toothbrush, toothpase, shampoo/conditioner, body wash, deoderant, etc.

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

Underwear

Black or White; Cotton; Non-Thong

Minimum: 6

Recommended: 9

Thermal Underwear

Required October - March

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 5

Sports Bra

Black or White

Minimum: 6

Recommended: 9

♀

Underwire Bra

Female Only

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 2

♀

Spandex Tights

Plain Black

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 3

Hairbrush

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

Hairbands and Bobby Pins

Female Only

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 10

♀

Wristwatch

Smart Watches Authorized

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

Eyeglasses

As Needed; Contacts not recommended

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 2

Eyeglass Strap

Glasses must be secured during physical and field events

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 3

Washcloth

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

Shower Shoes

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Towel

Smaller than 24 inches x 44 inches

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 3

Mesh Laundry Bags

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 4

Laundry Detergent

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

Dryer Sheets

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 2

Additional

Ballpoint Pens

Blue or Black

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 5

Cash

Approx $75

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 75

Laptop

Accessories, surge protector, headphones, waterproof case, etc.

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Lock

Quick access neccessary; Consider one with biometics or a pin instead of spin

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Notepaper

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 5

Pocket Notebook

Minimum: 2

Recommended: 5

Toiletry Bag

Minimum: 1

Recommended: 1

Extras

This section contains items which are recommended by prior WOTS Candidates rather than specifically in the WOTS Reporting Guide.

Blanket

You get a blanket, but it isn’t great.

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

CPAP Machine

If you need it, bring it. ‘Yes, we do in fact want you to continue freaking breathing!’

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

Fan

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

Massage Equipment

Massage gun/etc for general muscle (foot/shoulder/knee) soreness

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

Pillow

You get a pillow, but it isn’t great.

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1

Sweat Rag

There will be blood sweat.

Minimum: 0

Recommended: 1
